column4: Hi i have a problem with my gaim it wont connect for some reason why not?
Any one help me and try to figure out why my gaim isnt connecting?
do u have any other problems connecting to other services?
hmm, run gaim like this from a terminal "gaim --debug" and tell me what message it ends at
pastebin it or paste the last line or something
i think the msn servers dont like u.
thats all normal output except for when it randomly "disconnects" you which sometimes the msn servers will do if they think something is wrong
i dont know what to suggest :/
ok its just looking for repos that it cant find (i.e. the ones on the CD) either: insert the cd, or u can comment it out from the /etc/apt/source.list file (it should be near the top)
what one do i need to uncomment
i meant just find the deb report which is ur CD and put a "#" in front of that line
